QuestData.Title: The Secrets of Guo-Lai
QuestData.Description: I just received information from a guard stationed near the Ruins of Guo-Lai that the Shado-Tien leader entered the halls, killing two of my men in the process. They're intent on something inside. We need to stop them.$B$BHe Softfoot has already followed them in. He should be waiting for you at the entrance to the western chambers.$B$BMove quickly, $n. I don't like the thought that the mogu may be a step ahead of us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with He Softfoot in the Guo-Lai Halls and uncover the mogu's purpose in the western chamber.

Objectives.Objective: Uncover the mogu plan in the Hall of Statues
